original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: nana dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca nana dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca nanadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukañca na na dassanena pahātabba hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
